Name: M21 7.62x51 Precision Marksman Rifle
Description: After the Vietnam War, the US military sought a new type of sniper rifle. They decided to modify the original M14 for precision, raising the requirements for manufacturing processes and selecting a higher-precision heavy competition barrel, and improving the firing mechanism. The precision-modified M21 has extremely high accuracy, performs excellently in combat, and is highly favored by the US military and firearms enthusiasts.
